actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to facilitate contract enforcement and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize the Environmental Protection Agency to provide legal and technical assistance in: (1) the enforcement of contracts dealing with treatment works and (2) actions involving a serious question of effectiveness of a treatment system, posing a potential threat to public health. Empowers the Environmental Protection Agency to intervene in any civil action involving the enforcement of such contracts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to facilitate contract enforcement and for other purposes.
